p1-presentation: My name is Gaël Grandval, I am 19 years old, and I am currently in my 2nd year of a Professional Bachelor's in Multimedia and Internet Professions at Gustave Eiffel University.
p2-presentation:
Passionate for a long time about digital technology but especially
about the creation that stems from it, I am constantly seeking to learn new ways to express myself.
p3-presentation: Independent, meticulous, curious, and versatile, I am constantly striving to improve my skills in web development and graphic design with the hope of becoming a comprehensive developer.
p4-presentation: To find out more, you can check out my resume !
p-opquast:
In March 2025, I will take the Opquast web quality assurance certification as part of my studies at Gustave Eiffel University. This training provides a set of rules and varied skills in disciplines such as SEO, security, accessibility, personal data, performance, eco-design, and e-commerce.
From a professional and personal perspective, this learning will allow me to design and carry out higher-quality web projects by being aware of and taking into account the challenges related to the diversity of users.
reco1: Contributing in a serious, creative, and qualitative way, Gaël is an important asset in projects. He designs websites that are both user-friendly, visually harmonious, and functional. I enjoyed working alongside him, ensuring effective work in a good mood.
reco2: Gaël is a real asset to the team, always attentive to details and precision. He is a developer rich in both technical skills and creativity, renewing his ideas and taking a step back on his creations to get the best out of them.
reco3: I had the opportunity to work with Gaël on numerous projects; his mindset is both creative and logical. He is dedicated and motivated in all the projects he undertakes to ensure the result is functional and harmonious. He is a driving force in the group.
